privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Gym Genius is a workout tracking app. This privacy policy explains what data may be collected and how it relates to you, aligned with Apple App Store privacy categories.
privacy.dataLinkedIntro: The following data may be collected and linked to your identity:
privacy.clarification: Data collection can depend on app usage and device settings. This page is meant to be transparent and easy to read. For questions, contact

checklist.steps: Steps to reproduce (if reporting a bug)
